concept_data.title: Congress of Local and Regional Authorities of Europe

summary: The "Congress of Local and Regional Authorities of Europe" is a pivotal institution within the framework of the Council of Europe, aimed at promoting local democracy and regional governance. It serves as a platform for elected representatives from various European municipalities and regions to engage in dialogue, share best practices, and influence policy-making at the European level. The Congress plays a crucial role in ensuring compliance with the principles of local self-government and fostering cooperation among local authorities, thereby enhancing democratic governance across member states. Its regulatory functions include monitoring adherence to the European Charter of Local Self-Government, ensuring that local authorities can effectively represent their constituents.
